resources.string: Something wrong happened on Aucorsa server =(

This app is not official, but it consumes a public service provided by Aucorsa\'s web. That service is updated during the night, when buses get home and send cards info to the server. Updated info for your card can be queried in the morning. However, we are not responsible if at sometime data is not properly updated.
This card number is not valid
Add your tussam card to loop-up what\'s your credit! =) Turn back your card and introduce the 10-digit number found there, then type a name to help you identify your cards.
